name: Inception of Time VR
description:
A first person puzzle adventure game.

Inception of Time has been developed for Virtual Reality headsets.

Gameplay Features:
-Designed and built for Virtual Reality First.
-Free Locomotion Movement.
-Divine Powers (Slow Down Time, Turn Back Time and Ray of Death) necessary to complete Puzzles and Challenges.

"You have been chosen, fill your destiny" - You are a last hope to Save The World!

Support Touch (as Gamepad)
